title: Logo Editor Assistant
subtitle: AI-powered logo modifications
initialGreeting: Here is your selected logo. You can ask me to modify it!
welcomeMessage: Tell me what changes you'd like to make. For example: "Make it more modern", "Change the colors to blue", "Add a gradient effect", etc.

placeholders.prompt: Describe the changes you want... (Press Enter to send)

errors.modificationFailed: Sorry, I encountered an error while modifying the logo. Please try again with a different prompt.
